Title: Praetors
Legend: Praetors are exemplary bodyguards, linked to their assigned wards at an arcane, spiritual level. This connection allows the Praetor to accept the wounds of their charge unto themselves, keeping Sigmar’s champions hale and whole.
Intro: Each model in a Praetors unit is armed with a Soulguard's Halberd.

Rules.Name: Champion
Rules.Rule: CHAMPION: 1 model in this unit can be a Praetor-Prime. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model's Soulguard's Halberd.
